style="font-size: 16px;">notification about new scraped data" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=16;fontFamily=Helvetica;" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-10"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0024" y="-4" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-2" value="Scrapper Container" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontFamily=Helvetica;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="221" y="280" width="120" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-4" value="BATK Website" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontFamily=Helvetica;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-90" y="40" width="185" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-6" value="Client <br style="font-size: 16px;">Container" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontFamily=Helvetica;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="70" width="120" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-7" value="Backend Container" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontFamily=Helvetica;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="430" width="120" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-12" value="BPCHub" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="5" width="810" height="855" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-17" value="Database" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-12"> <mxGeometry x="660" y="665" width="90" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-15" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-16" value="WebSocket based<br style="font-size: 16px;">real-time synchronization" x="800" y="610" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-19" value="CRUD operations" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=16;" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="4Te89Yqgjfm6M2q8kvW3-18"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0383" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 296px; margin-left: 102px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Scrapes the raw HTML
every 6 hours

div.div:
Sends the data to the
backend over the API
to save it in DB
